TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class StructureChangedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 包含使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄結構變更時引發之事件的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

related.span: 訂閱 UI 自動化事件

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: structureChangeType
param.span: 指定變更類型的單一值。

span.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: 其結構變更之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 執行階段。

span.span: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定結構變更項目的變更類型和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在傳回的值`structureChangeType`實作 UI 自動化提供者而定。The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. 例如，當項目會加入或移除從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]清單方塊中，如果提供者無法判斷的新增或移除的項目數，它可能會指定而非或。For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify and not or . 下表描述的資訊，萬一收到不同的結構變更。The following table describes the information in the event received by the for different structure changes. |`structureChangeType`|事件來源Event source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||已新增的子系。The child that was added.|已新增的子系。The child that was added.| ||已移除的子系的父系。The parent of the child that was removed.|已移除的子系。The child that was removed.| ||已新增的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.|已新增的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.| ||已移除的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.|已移除的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.| ||判定為無效的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were invalidated.|判定為無效的子系的父代The parent of the children that were invalidated| 自訂控制項可能無法提供有意義的值，在`runtimeId`。Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建構和引發事件時，會新增子系，或從自訂的清單方塊中移除。The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取結構變更之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]執行階段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

returns.span: 結構變更之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的執行階段識別碼。

span.span: The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值可能是識別項之子系的已加入或移除，或在許多子系的情況下所加入、 移除或失效，父系的識別碼。The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 自訂控制項可能無法提供有效的執行階段識別項。Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StructureChangeType As StructureChangeType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得的值表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀結構中發生變更的型別。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.
The type of changed that occurred.
